short_description: An astronaut in a cream-colored spacesuit stands at the Martian sunset, filled with awe and curiosity, as the warm orange glow casts a long shadow behind him, with a metallic sample collection tool in hand, in a moment of profound discovery, captured with a soft diffused side light and eye-level camera angle

objects.description: A 40-year-old astronaut, dressed in a bulky, cream-colored spacesuit with a faded NASA patch on the left shoulder, orange accents, and a textured, metallic sheen, stands at the Martian sunset with an mix of awe and curiosity on his face, his short, light brown hair visible under the raised gold-tinted visor, a few days' worth of stubble on his jawline, piercing blue eyes with a hint of wonder, a small scar above his left eyebrow from a past mission, average height with a fit, athletic build, maintaining a slightly bent posture as if leaning in to examine the ancient alien artifact more closely, his right hand grasping a metallic sample collection tool while his left hand rests on the hip, oriented at a three-quarter angle to the camera, the Martian landscape stretching out behind him with the artifact at his feet, a silver astronaut identification tag visible on his chest, a communication device on his wrist, and a utility belt around his waist with various tools and pouches
objects.shape_and_color: cream-colored spacesuit with orange accents and metallic sheen
objects.appearance_details: bulky spacesuit, short light brown hair, few days' worth of stubble, piercing blue eyes, small scar above left eyebrow
objects.pose: slightly bent posture, right hand grasping metallic sample collection tool, left hand on hip

negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, deformed, disfigured, bad anatomy, extra limbs, mutation
